main event: On 05/14/53 in Council Bluffs, Iowa, civilians reported observing a flat, round object, about the size of a basketball held at arm's length, moving at an extremely high rate of speed. The object made a sound comparable to a jet and had an orange and silver reflection.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 30 seconds, moving from the northwest half circle to the east at a very fast pace.
The object did not have any special features, formation, or exhaust.
The weather during the observation was cloudy with no specific ceiling available on clouds and no thunderstorms in the area.
There were no ground visuals or photographs taken of the object.
The observers suspected that the object could be a low-flying jet aircraft.
sighted object: flat, round object with orange and silver reflection
